text: Whether you want to see Jon and Dany win it all, or you ’ re putting your money on Arya and her hit list, Game of Thrones fans have a hard time agreeing who should ultimately get the Iron Throne. But one study might just have the answer — at least, the scientific answer — for who should actually rule the Seven Kingdoms. In an actual study from Macquarie University in Australia, epidemiologists ( people who study the spread and distribution of disease ) examined the series and found that being of noble birth, female and flexible about loyalty were the strongest characteristics for surviving to the end. Sounds like we have a Daenerys Targaryen on the throne, then ( although, she doesn ’ t see herself there, apparently ). Noble? Check. Female? Check. Wavering
